Baked Chicken Parmesan

Ingredients

Nutritional facts

Calories

270

Protein

33g

Carbs

5g

Total Fat

11g

Fiber

1g

Sugar

3g

Instructions

1

Prepare the chicken

In a small bowl, combine the breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and salt. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg whites and water. Dip each chicken breast in the egg white mixture, then dredge in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Preheat oven to 400°F. Lightly mist a large baking sheet with non-stick cooking spray and set aside.

5 mins
2

Bake the chicken

Evenly divide the marinara sauce over the top of each chicken breast, then sprinkle with the mozzarella cheese. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F and the cheese is melted and bubbly.

25 mins
